text: Ramofo avamumo Nagrane emani'ne. Na'ankure agra huhampri nanteno, zamunte omane vahepi Knare Musenkea huama huo huno hunante'ne. Agra hunanteno huama hugeno, kinafi mani'nesaza vahe'mo'za katufe'za nevnageno, zamu suhu vahe'mo'za negesageno, vahe'mo'za zamazeri haviza nehanaza nagamoza fru hu'za nemanisagena,
